document_data.name: Nüber
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nüber''' was a rather annoying man who lived on the [[Sword Coast]] during the mid—14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|Ugh. I lost my [[boot]]. Oh well. The [[Shining Crusade|crusade]] will give me a new one, don't you think.}}
document_data.Description: His boot size was six rods and a jackdaw.
document_data.Personality: He had the habit of repeatedly asking inane questions and sharing ''non sequitur'' statements about his life.
document_data.History:
On one occasion, Nüber saw a rider on a [[horse]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Nüber went searching for [[Caelar Argent|Kayler]] in order to join the [[Shining Crusade]] with the hopes of getting a new pair of boots. He made it at least as far as [[Dead Man's Pass]].
